changeSet.author: jbeam
changeSet.sql:
UPDATE [dbo].[ItemTypes] SET ItemTypeDisplayName = 'dd-Jan-yy' WHERE ItemTypeValue = 'itemsDateFormat-3'
UPDATE [dbo].[ItemTypes] SET ItemTypeDisplayName = 'January dd, yyyy' WHERE ItemTypeValue = 'itemsDateFormat-4'
UPDATE [dbo].[ItemTypes] SET ItemTypeDisplayName = 'dd-Jan-yyyy' WHERE ItemTypeValue = 'itemsDateFormat-5'
